publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leon. Lichfield for Richard Davis, and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ... Henry Mortlock ... and at the White Hart ...,

notesStmt.note: Includes the text of "Exemplar literarum quas comites & barones Angliae = The coppy of a letter sent by the earls and barons of England," dated Feb. 12, 1300, as an example to the English nobility of their ancestors' resistance to the Pope's authority over the crown.
